title: Replace teacher profile placeholder images with uploaded photos

requirements.text: Replace the placeholder image for Abhijit Da's teacher profile with the uploaded photo showing him in a white patterned shirt speaking at a microphone with decorative background
acceptanceCriteria: Abhijit Da's profile card displays the uploaded photo instead of the placeholder
The image maintains proper aspect ratio and fits within the 400x400px teacher profile card dimensions
The image displays correctly in both English and Bengali language modes

requirements.text: Replace the placeholder image for Santanu Sir's teacher profile with the uploaded photo showing him outdoors in a white dotted shirt with sunglasses and green background
acceptanceCriteria: Santanu Sir's profile card displays the uploaded photo instead of the placeholder
The image maintains proper aspect ratio and fits within the 400x400px teacher profile card dimensions
The image displays correctly in both English and Bengali language modes

requirements.text: Replace the placeholder image for Sonali Ma'am's teacher profile with the uploaded photo showing her in traditional pink saree with red bindi against pink background
acceptanceCriteria: Sonali Ma'am's profile card displays the uploaded photo instead of the placeholder
The image maintains proper aspect ratio and fits within the 400x400px teacher profile card dimensions
The image displays correctly in both English and Bengali language modes

requirements.text: Render the three generated teacher photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory and update the Teachers component to reference these asset paths
acceptanceCriteria: All three teacher photos are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated
The Teachers component imports and displays images from the assets directory
Images load correctly without network requests to external sources
The responsive grid layout for teacher profiles remains intact with the new images

constraints: Do not modify the existing Teachers component structure or layout beyond image source changes
Maintain the existing responsive grid layout and card styling
Preserve bilingual support functionality for all teacher profile text content
nonGoals: Modifying teacher profile information (names, experience, classes, subjects)
Changing the Teachers section position in App.tsx
Altering the color scheme or typography of teacher profile cards
Adding new teacher profiles beyond the existing three
